text:
Adroit Infotech Subsidiary Launches VAI360 CRM Platform and IntelHub-X Gateway Hub
VersoAltima India Private Limited, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Adroit Infotech Limited, has introduced two new products: VAI360 Unified CRM and IntelHub-X. VAI360 is an intelligent CRM platform integrating multiple business functions for industries like telecom, cable, and broadband. IntelHub-X is an enterprise gateway application connecting billing and CRM software providers with cable and broadband operators. Both products aim to facilitate digital transformation and improve operational efficiency across various industries.

 Adroit Infotech Limited's wholly-owned subsidiary, VersoAltima India Private Limited, has launched two innovative products during its Annual Day celebration. The new offerings are designed to revolutionize industries through seamless digital transformation and future-ready solutions.
Product Launch Details
VersoAltima India announced the launch of two flagship products targeting multiple industry verticals, with a specific focus on the telecom and broadband industries:
| Product | Details |
|---|---|
| VAI360 Unified CRM | Intelligent customer relationship management platform |
| IntelHub-X | Intelligent Enterprise Gateway Hub |
| Launch Date | December 19 |
| Event | Annual Day celebration |
VAI360 Unified CRM
VAI360 represents a unified, intelligent CRM platform that consolidates multiple business functions on a single platform. The comprehensive solution integrates:
- Customer lifecycle management
- Partner portals
- Customer self-care services
- Complaints management
- Inventory stock management
The platform is designed to orchestrate multiple touchpoint systems, driving operational excellence while delivering connected customer and partner experiences. VAI360 aims to enable scalable business and revenue growth through integration with enterprise billing and financial systems.
Supported Industries
The VAI360 platform targets several key industry verticals:
- Telecom
- Cable
- Media
- Broadband
- Logistics
- Transportation
IntelHub-X Intelligent Enterprise Gateway Hub
IntelHub-X serves as an intelligent enterprise gateway application designed to connect billing and CRM software providers with cable and broadband operators. The solution aims to eliminate the complexity of building and maintaining operator-specific integrations, potentially ensuring faster time-to-market and improved operational efficiency.
The platform is designed to empower end customers to perform transactions directly with operators, which may reduce dependency on local agents while potentially improving transparency, customer experience, and collection efficiency.
Target Market
IntelHub-X focuses on specific industry segments:
- Cable
- Media
- Broadband
Strategic Impact
Both products are positioned to enable end-to-end digital transformation for organizations across supported industries. The solutions are designed to address current market challenges in customer management and operational efficiency.
The launch represents VersoAltima India's effort to provide technology solutions that aim to streamline business operations while enhancing customer experiences across multiple industry verticals.
